thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com | 4 of 100
thread.title: Christina

author: Christina
title: Christina
text: The item arrived in reasonable time. My husband installed it in about an hour. He followed the instructions and had no problems. It completely transformed our bathroom mirror. We had been saying we were going to frame the mirror for months, and finally decided to go with mirror mate instead of creating our own frame. I'm so glad we did. They made this process easy and the results are beautiful.
